---
title: Topic Set 2 - Exploring Urban Greenhouse Gas Emissions (75 min)
---
**Activity 4**: Use the Urban Dashboard to Examine GHG data in Urban Areas (15 min)

Explore the similarities and differences between GHG characteristics between different urban areas and between different GHG gases within a given city. 

**Activity 5**: Use Notebooks to Further Explore Data in Jupyter Hub (30 min)

Use a notebook in the JupyterHub to step through actions that develop figures and plots.

**Activity 6**: Use GHG Data in QGIS and Access STAC (30 min)

Use QGIS to read the GHG Center STAC data and devise plots that communicate information to decision makers.
